data.title: Physical Activity: Built Environment Approaches
data.meta_description: CPSTF recommends built environment strategies combing pedestrian/bicycle transportation systems with land use/environmental design to increase physical activity.
data.text:
The number of studies and publications do not always correspond (e.g., a publication may include several studies or one study may be explained in several publications).
